incidents.title: Billing System Maintenance
incidents.content: On 27.07.2021 we will perform maintenance work on our billing system from 12pm to 2pm (CEST). During this time, the Customer Center will be completely or partially unavailable.

incidents.title: Maintenance on tshost.myvirtualserver.com
incidents.content:
The maintenance work will take place on Tuesday the 27.07.2021 at 10 A.M. (CEST) and will probably last 60 minutes, during this time the whole teamspeak host will be unavailable. This maintenance work is necessary to further improve the quality of our products.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
